title: Exponential Killer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attack a player at night. You can use this as many times each night as you have killed players, times two. (If you've killed 4 players, you may kill 8 players in one night.)
- Attack a player. 1 use, your charge is refunded if the player does not actually die.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who would oppose you.
